4RqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Welcome.
Your eyes are shining.
I looked great when I was young like you.
4RqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Welcome.
Your eyes are shining.
I looked great when I was young like you.

4hqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
I had black hair and I was full of energy at that time.
I could use all kind of magic, too.
4hqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
I had black hair and I was full of energy at that time.
I could use all kind of magic, too.

4xqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
A great power helped me to cast spells .
I couldn't forget that day.
It was the day of the summer solstice when sunshine was the strongest of a year. And that night was the shortest.
4xqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
A great power helped me to cast spells .
I couldn't forget that day.
It was the day of the summer solstice when sunshine was the strongest of a year. And that night was the shortest.

5BqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Ancient magic will be able to regain its power and  everyone's wishes will come true.
Would you like me to tell you about the day more?
5BqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Ancient magic will be able to regain its power and  everyone's wishes will come true.
Would you like me to tell you about the day more?

5xqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
You look young but your way of thinking is like an old.
Sweet dream and good night.
5xqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
You look young but your way of thinking is like an old.
Sweet dream and good night.

6BqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
You're such a curious kid. You're young and  trying to realize your dream.
Then you gather 9 nine herbs on the summer solstice.
6BqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
You're such a curious kid. You're young and  trying to realize your dream.
Then you gather 9 nine herbs on the summer solstice.

6RqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
And you find out the magic flame.
You throw those herbs into the flame praying for your wishes.
You absolutely say magic words too. You'll be able to practice the magic .
6RqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
And you find out the magic flame.
You throw those herbs into the flame praying for your wishes.
You absolutely say magic words too. You'll be able to practice the magic .

6hqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
But, you should not talk about this to anyone since you decide to gather herbs.
Or you won't be able to make your wishes.
6hqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
But, you should not talk about this to anyone since you decide to gather herbs.
Or you won't be able to make your wishes.

6xqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Do you know which herbs you need?
Keep in mind that once you put in hand, you won't be able to get back.
6xqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Do you know which herbs you need?
Keep in mind that once you put in hand, you won't be able to get back.

7hqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Ok, nine herbs..
I'll tell you a secret of the shortest night.
What you need is...
7hqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Ok, nine herbs..
I'll tell you a secret of the shortest night.
What you need is...

7xqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Get me green herb, blue herb, leaf of Yggdrasil, Hinalle, root of Maneater, thin slem, stem, clothes with leaves and jasmine.
7xqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Get me green herb, blue herb, leaf of Yggdrasil, Hinalle, root of Maneater, thin slem, stem, clothes with leaves and jasmine.

8BqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
If you want to know more about this, see Druid.
If you get all herbs that I told you, take them to me.
I'll let you know the spell..
8BqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
If you want to know more about this, see Druid.
If you get all herbs that I told you, take them to me.
I'll let you know the spell..

8RqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Get me red herb, blossom of maneater, shoot,  pointed scale, seed of Yggdrasil, tough vines, leaflet of aloe, soft leaf and jasmine.
8RqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Get me red herb, blossom of maneater, shoot,  pointed scale, seed of Yggdrasil, tough vines, leaflet of aloe, soft leaf and jasmine.

8hqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Get me yellow herb, bamboo cut, Yggdrasilberry, clover, tree root, sharp leaf, great leaf and jasmine.
8hqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Get me yellow herb, bamboo cut, Yggdrasilberry, clover, tree root, sharp leaf, great leaf and jasmine.

8xqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Ok, think about it more and complete the work what you're doing.
To learn magic, we need to get many things ready.
8xqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Ok, think about it more and complete the work what you're doing.
To learn magic, we need to get many things ready.

9BqYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Hush, don't make a voice. Your wishes are not going to come true.
Is it hard to you?
Don't forget herbs you need to get.
9BqYAw.pt:
[Old lady]
Hush, don't make a voice. Your wishes are not going to come true.

You're surrounded by energies of the shortest night.
as far as you put the coronet, a pure power will protect you.
ABuYAw.pt:
[Old lady]

as far as you put the coronet, a pure power will protect you.

ARuYAw.en:
[Old lady]
Young people aren't romantic these days...
ARuYAw.pt:
[Old lady]

BBuYAw.en:
[Druid]
I'm more painful than any other!
Throw the cap with flowers into fires.
The most truthful person will be able to greet the night!
BBuYAw.pt:
[Druid]
I'm more painful than any other!
Throw the cap with flowers into fires.

You're looking for flowers or herbs but you can't find them out now.
BRuYAw.pt:
[Druid]

CRuYAw.en:
[Druid]
All herbs you need are in the forest of Midgartz.
They want to be found by you.
And they're expecting to be thrown into magic flames.
CRuYAw.pt:
[Druid]
All herbs you need are in the forest of Midgartz.

ChuYAw.en:

ChuYAw.pt:
[Druid]
I think I can give you one thing that you'll not be able to find there. Do you want it?

DhuYAw.en:
[Druid]
Your way of answering is energetic.
But that's why the power you wanted has just run away.
I can't give it to you.
DhuYAw.pt:
[Druid]
Your way of answering is energetic.

DxuYAw.en:
[Druid]
You said absolutely?!
Don't you think that you forgot something you should keep?
That's why the power you're looking for has just run away from the herb.
You're such a fool.
DxuYAw.pt:
[Druid]
You said absolutely?!
Don't you think that you forgot something you should keep?

EBuYAw.pt:

like now.
